data:
## function_createModal
> **createModal**\<`Data`\>(`config`?): [`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

Creates a new modal widget instance.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Parameters

• **config?**: [`PropsConfig`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#propsconfig)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

config of the modal, either as a store or as an object containing values or stores.

### Returns

[`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

a new modal widget instance

## function_getModalDefaultConfig
> **getModalDefaultConfig**(): [`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default modal config

### Returns

[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

the default modal config

## interface_ModalActions
### Methods

#### closeButtonClick

> **closeButtonClick**(`event`): `void`

Action to be called when the user clicks on the close button. It closes the modal with the [modalCloseButtonClick](#modalclosebuttonclick) result.

##### Parameters

• **event**: [`Pick`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#picktype-keys)\<[`MouseEvent`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/MouseEvent), `never`\>

mouse event

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### modalClick

> **modalClick**(`event`): `void`

Action to be called when the user clicks on the modal DOM element (which is supposed to have the size of the full viewport).
If the click is not done on a descendant of the modal DOM element, it is considered to be done outside the modal
and, depending on the value of the [closeOnOutsideClick](#modalprops-closeonoutsideclick) prop, the modal is or isn't closed
(with the [modalOutsideClick](#modaloutsideclick) result).

##### Parameters

• **event**: [`Pick`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#picktype-keys)\<[`MouseEvent`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/MouseEvent), `"target"` \| `"currentTarget"`\>

mouse event

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_ModalApi
### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Properties

#### patch

> **patch**: (`parameters`) => `void`

Modify the parameter values, and recalculate the stores accordingly

##### Parameters

• **parameters**: [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

##### Returns

`void`

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(`result`?): `void`

Closes the modal with the given result.

##### Parameters

• **result?**: `any`

result of the modal, as passed in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the event passed to the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler (and possibly changed by it) and resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

Opens the modal and returns a promise that is resolved when the modal is closed.
The resolved value is the result passed to the [close](#modalapi-close) method and possibly changed by the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

## interface_ModalBeforeCloseEvent
### Properties

#### cancel

> **cancel**: `boolean`

Whether to cancel the close of the modal.
It can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

***

#### result

> **result**: `any`

Result of the modal, which is the value passed to the [close](#modalapi-close) method
and later resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method.
If needed, it can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

## constant_modalCloseButtonClick
> `const` **modalCloseButtonClick**: *typeof* `modalCloseButtonClick`

Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click on the close button.

## class_ModalComponent
Modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Implements

- [`AfterContentChecked`](https://angular.dev/api/core/AfterContentChecked)

### Constructors

#### new ModalComponent

> **new ModalComponent**\<`Data`\>(): [`ModalComponent`](#modalcomponent)\<`Data`\>

##### Returns

[`ModalComponent`](#modalcomponent)\<`Data`\>

### Properties

#### _widget

> `readonly` **\_widget**: [`AngularWidget`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#angularwidget)\<[`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>\>

***

#### animated

> **animated**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `undefined` \| `string`

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: `undefined` \| [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### beforeClose

> **beforeClose**: `EventEmitter`\<[`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)\>

Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the ModalApi.close|close method was called).

##### Param

event giving access to the argument given to the ModalApi.close|close method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `undefined` \| `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> **closeOnOutsideClick**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `undefined` \| `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `undefined` \| `Data`

Data to use in content slots

***

#### defaultSlots

> `readonly` **defaultSlots**: [`WritableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/WritableSignal.html)\<[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>\>, [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>\>\>

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `EventEmitter`\<`void`\>

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### modalTransition

> **modalTransition**: `undefined` \| [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### shown

> **shown**: `EventEmitter`\<`void`\>

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### slotDefaultFromContent

> **slotDefaultFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`ModalBodyDirective`](#modalbodydirective)\<`Data`\>

***

#### slotFooterFromContent

> **slotFooterFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`ModalFooterDirective`](#modalfooterdirective)\<`Data`\>

***

#### slotHeaderFromContent

> **slotHeaderFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`ModalHeaderDirective`](#modalheaderdirective)\<`Data`\>

***

#### slotStructureFromContent

> **slotStructureFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`ModalStructureDirective`](#modalstructuredirective)\<`Data`\>

***

#### slotTitleFromContent

> **slotTitleFromContent**: `undefined` \| [`ModalTitleDirective`](#modaltitledirective)\<`Data`\>

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Title of the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `undefined` \| `boolean`

Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### visibleChange

> **visibleChange**: `EventEmitter`\<`boolean`\>

Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Param

new value of the visible propery

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

### Accessors

#### api

> `get` **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]

##### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

***

#### state

> `get` **state**(): [`Signal`](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)\<[`WidgetState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#widgetstate)\<`W`\>\>

***

#### widget

##### Returns

[`ContextWidget`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#contextwidget)\<`W`\>

### Methods

#### ngAfterContentChecked

> **ngAfterContentChecked**(): `void`

A callback method that is invoked immediately after the
default change detector has completed checking all of the directive's
content.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Implementation of

`AfterContentChecked.ngAfterContentChecked`

***

#### ngOnChanges

> **ngOnChanges**(`changes`): `void`

##### Parameters

• **changes**: `SimpleChanges`

`void`

##### Inherit Doc

***

#### ngOnInit

> **ngOnInit**(): `void`

`void`

## interface_ModalDirectives
### Properties

#### backdropDirective

> **backdropDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)

***

***

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button

***

#### dialogDirective

> **dialogDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)

Directive to apply to the dialog element when using the native [HTMLDialogElement](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLDialogElement)

***

#### modalDirective

> **modalDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)

Directive to put on the modal DOM element.

***

#### modalPortalDirective

> **modalPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#directive)

Portal directive to put on the modal DOM element.

## constant_modalOutsideClick
> `const` **modalOutsideClick**: *typeof* `modalOutsideClick`

Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click inside the viewport but outside the modal.

## interface_ModalProps
### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `boolean`

Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`

Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> **closeOnOutsideClick**: `boolean`

Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`

Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`

Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### modalTransition

> **modalTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### onBeforeClose

> **onBeforeClose**: (`event`) => `void`

Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the [close](#modalapi-close) method was called).

##### Parameters

• **event**: [`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)

event giving access to the argument given to the [close](#modalapi-close) method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

• **visible**: `boolean`

new value of the visible propery

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Title of the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## interface_ModalState
### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropHidden

> **backdropHidden**: `boolean`

Whether the backdrop is fully hidden. This can be true either because [backdrop](#modalprops-backdrop) is false or
because [visible](#modalprops-visible) is false and there is no current transition.

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`

Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`

Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`

Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Whether the modal is fully hidden.

***

#### modalElement

> **modalElement**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

DOM element of the modal.

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/modal/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Title of the modal.

***

#### transitioning

> **transitioning**: `boolean`

Whether there is an active transition to either display or hide the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`
